texts.es: Walter es un joven con visión y espíritu emprendedor; a sus 25 años de edad, trabaja como mesero en un restaurante pero, con el ánimo de complementar sus ingresos tomó la iniciativa de vender mercancía como ropa y calzado para hombre, mujer y niño, lo que le permite apoyar a su familia con los gastos del hogar. Su dinamismo, empuje y energía positiva le han permitido salir adelante y siempre va en busca de nuevas opciones que lo impulsen a lograr sus objetivos. Esto lo motiva a solicitar el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar mercancía al por mayor (camisas, blusas, zapatos, tenis, bolsos, chaquetas, entre otros), para abastecerse con más variedad de artículos que le permita satisfacer los gustos y necesidades de su clientela, conformada por vecinos, familiares, amigos y compañeros de trabajo; esto le ayudará a satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa en la temporada de fin de año, permitiéndole percibir mejores utilidades. Walter manifiesta su interés para seguir trabajando incansablemente, pues se proyecta hacia un futuro cercano, en el que desea abrir su propio almacén y ampliar su mercado, generando una estabilidad económica para dar a su familia el apoyo económico y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Walter is a 25-year-old young man with vision and an entrepreneurial spirit. He works as a waiter in a restaurant but in order to supplement his income he took the initiative to sell merchandise such as clothing and shoes for men, women and children. This enables him to help his family with the household expenses. His drive, dynamism and positive energy have helped him to get ahead and he is always on the lookout for new ways of being able to achieve his goals. 

This is why he is asking for help via the loan, which he wants to use to buy wholesale merchandise (such as shirts, blouses, shoes, trainers, bags, jackets and other items) so he can stock up with a larger variety of items which will satisfy the tastes and needs of his customers. These consist of neighbours, family members, friends and work colleagues. This will help him to meet the increased demand of the end-of-year season and will enable him to get better profits.

Walter says he intends to carry on working tirelessly since he is working towards opening his own store in the near future and increasing his market, which will provide financial stability so he can give his family financial support and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale merchandise (shirts, blouses, shoes, trainers, bags, jackets and other items.

loans.name: Astou

texts.fr: Madame Astou est une femme âgée de 43 ans qui est mariée et mère de 5 enfants. Elle évolue dans  la commercialisation des céréales et la confection des draps.  Elle a une expérience de plus  de 8ans et commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 19h. Elle aide son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes .Astou sollicite ce montant pour acheter du fil et  du tissu pour confectionner des draps, elle fait aussi la vente de céréales. A l’avenir Astou voudrait diversifier ses activités afin de pouvoir augmenter ses revenus et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en: Astou is a 43-year old woman who is married and mother to five children. She has been building up a business selling cereals and making bed sheets, and has more than eight years' experience. She begins her day at eight in the morning and finishes at seven in the evening. She helps her husband to manage the daily outgoings. Astou is requesting this loan so she can buy thread and fabric to make sheets with. She also sells cereals. In the future she would like to diversify her activities so that she can increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cereals and make bed sheets to sell.

loans.name: Andrés Mauricio

texts.es: Andrés, a sus 33 años de edad, se dedica a trabajar realizando trabajos de latonería y pintura para vehículos, su puesto de trabajo está ubicado en un parqueadero del centro del municipio donde reside, trabaja todos los días de 7:00 am a 6:00 pm; pero con el ánimo de complementar sus ingresos, desea ampliar sus servicios, por lo que desea comenzar a prestar el servicio de lavado de vehículos; por ello se motiva para solicitar el crédito, pues requiere comprar una máquina hidrolavadora semi industrial y una aspiradora, con lo que podrá dar inicio a la prestación de este servicio y aprovechar que diariamente resultan clientes solicitando el servicio, así podrá complementar los ingresos y le permitirá sobrepasar los diversos obstáculos especialmente los económicos, ya que en algunas ocasiones los gastos familiares se incrementan inesperadamente, generándole una crisis financiera. Sin embargo, esto lo motiva aún más para seguir luchando por el bienestar de su familia y, por ello sueña con tener su negocio bien posicionado en el mercado, lograr que sea reconocido para aumentar sus ventas y mejorar la entrada de dinero al hogar, con el que podrá garantizar a su hijo un futuro mucho más próspero y disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida con los que ama.
texts.en:
Andrés, 33, provides a collision repair service for vehicles. His workplace is located in a parking lot in the centre of the city where he lives. He works every day from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm but as he would like to increase his earnings he intends to add to his services, which is why he would like to start offering a car wash service. 

Because of this he is applying for a loan, as he would need to purchase a semi industrial pressure washer and a vacuum cleaner with which he could begin to offer his services and take advantage of the daily requests for this service from his customers. By doing this he can add to his current earnings, which will allow him to overcome various obstacles, particularly financial, since on some occasions the family's costs have increased unexpectedly and he has found himself in a financial crisis. Even so, this has only served to make him work even harder for his family's well being. 

This is the reason why he dreams of having a business that is well positioned on the market, of being able to increase his sales and improve the flow of money into his household. This would mean he could guarantee his son a future which is much more prosperous and enjoy a better quality of life with the people he loves.

loans.use: to buy a semi industrial pressure washer and a vacuum cleaner

loans.name: Marie Madeleine

texts.fr: Marie est une femme célibataire qui vit dans un qartier de la capital. Elle tient un restaurant depuis trois  ans où elle propose divers plats. Grace à son dynamisme elle s'est faite une clientèle dont elle aimerait continuer de satisfaire. Pour cela, elle sollicite un prêt dans l'otique d'augmenter son stock de nourriture et de boissons. Les bénéfices tirés de ce prêt lui permettront d'assurer la pérennité de son entreprise tout en subvenant aux besoins de ses frères.
texts.en: Marie is a single woman who lives in one of the capital's districts. She has been running a restaurant for the past three years, where she serves a variety of dishes. Due to her high energy, she has built up a customer base that she would like to continue to satisfy. In order to do this, she is requesting a loan so that she can increase her stock of food and beverages. The profits made as a result of this loan will allow her to ensure the longevity of her business while meeting the needs of her brothers.

loans.use: to increase her stock of food and beverages.

loans.name: Mame Diarra

texts.fr: La promotrice s’appelle Mame Diarra, elle est mariée et mère de famille. Agée de 36 ans,  elle évolue dans le commerce et a une expérience de plus de 7ans dans son activité. Madame Mame Diarra sollicite ce prêt d’un montant de 300.000 F CFA pour acheter des accessoires de mercerie ; elle aide son mari dans la gestion des charges familiales et les frais de scolarité de  ses enfants. Elle commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 20h. Elle souhaite à l’avenir développer son commerce et élargi sa mercerie ainsi elle pourra augmenter ses revenus et améliorer les conditions de sa vie et celle de sa famille.
texts.en: The borrower is called Mame Diarra and she is 36 years old, married and a mother. She has been building up a business and now has seven years' experience. She is requesting a loan of 300,000FCFA so that she can buy haberdashery products. She helps her husband with the household expenses and her children's schooling costs. She begins her day at eight in the morning and finishes at eight in the evening. She would like to develop her business in the future and expand her haberdashery, so that she can increase her income and improve her living conditions as well as those of her family.

loans.use: to buy fabric and haberdashery products to sell.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is a married man. He has seven children. He describes himself as a motivated person. He operates a retail business where he sells milk, bread, eggs and other products.
 
Moses has been involved in this business for 16 years. His business is located in a good area and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge as a lack of enough funds. He will use the KES 50,000 loan to add stock of milk, bread, sugar and other items. 

Moses hopes that in the future, he will improve his living standards. This is his third loan with SMEP DTM. His previous loan of KES 40,000 was repaid successfully. Moses will use the anticipated profits to start another business.

loans.use: to add stock of milk, bread, sugar and other items.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en: Christine appreciates her previous Kiva loan, which improved her living standards and enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income. She is requesting a loan of KES 10,000 to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She thanks Yehu for its financial support.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Mauricio De Jesús

texts.es: Mauricio, a sus 50 años de edad, se dedica a trabajar en su propio negocio, una marquetería que inició como alternativa para generar recursos económicos para su familia; la actividad la aprendió de manera empírica y, con el paso del tiempo logró perfeccionar su técnica, cuenta con el apoyo de un empleado directo con quien trabaja todos los días de 8:00 am a 8:00 pm, así puede aprovechar la ventaja que tiene, pues no posee competencia cercana en el sector, por lo que puede atender gran cantidad de clientes. Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar insumos y materia prima al por mayor (madera, vidrios, pegante, puntillas, entre otros), con lo que podrá tener material disponible para cumplir con la producción que tiene pendiente, lo que le permitirá tener mejores ventas y mejorar la entrada de recursos económicos para solventar las necesidades básicas del hogar. Mauricio, dentro de su humilde personalidad, sueña con poder darle continuidad a su negocio, acreditarlo y en un futuro poder adquirir un local mucho más amplio, en el que pueda generar nuevas oportunidades de empleo y así mejorar la calidad de vida tanto de su familia, como la de otras personas que influyan en esta ardua labor.
texts.en:
Mauricio, 50, has his own marquetry business which he began with economic resources from his family.  He learned the skill on his own and over time has been able to perfect his technique.  He has one direct employee and works every day from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. to take advantage of his situation, since he has no nearby competition in the sector and has many customers.

He is currently requesting a loan to buy supplies and raw materials wholesale (wood, glass, glue, nails, etc.) so he will have enough inventory on hand to meet pending production requirements.  This will allow him to increase sales and improve income to take care of basic household needs.

Mauricio, who is a humble person, dreams about continuing his business, investing capital and in the future having a much larger workspace.  That would generate more opportunities for employment and improve his family's quality of life as well as that of the other people who participate in this hard work.

loans.use: To buy supplies and raw materials wholesale (wood, glass, glue, nails, etc.)

loans.name: Edilberto Antonio

texts.es: Edilberto es un campesino de 59 años de edad, que durante toda su vida se ha dedicado a realizar las tareas del campo, aprendidas desde que era un niño, cuando sus padres le enseñaban todo lo referente a la agricultura. Hoy en día, posee cultivos de plátano cuya cosecha recolecta y vende en la plaza de mercado de la región, adicionalmente, alterna el cuidado de sus cultivos, realizando labores como jornalero en diferentes fincas de la zona, lo que le permite complementar los ingresos que recibe para solventar las necesidades básicas de su familia. El cliente tiene el empuje y la tenacidad que caracterizan los campesinos, cualidades que le han permitido salir adelante. Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar insumos agrícolas al por mayor (pesticidas, fungicidas, abonos, fertilizantes, entre otros), con los cuales podrá continuar cuidando sus cultivos y preparar la tierra para la cosecha, logrando así tener una producción mucho más sana que sirva como valor agregado para facilitar la venta del producto en el mercado. Edilberto manifiesta que su avanzada edad no le impide seguir trabajando en las labores que le apasionan, pues hacen parte de sus raíces y se ha convertido en su fuente se ingresos económicos, con los que podrá seguir sustentando las necesidades familiares y en un futuro podrá disfrutar de una mejor calidad de vida al lado de su esposa.
texts.en:
Edilberto, 59, is a farmer who has spent all his life in agriculture which he learned as a child from his parents who taught him everything he needed to know about the activity.  He now has banana plantations and sells his harvested produce at the regional market.  He also works as a hired hand on other farms in the area to earn extra income to cover basic family needs.

This borrower has the drive and tenacity that farmers are known for which have enabled him to prosper.  He is requesting a loan to buy wholesale farm supplies (pesticides, fungicides, fertilizers, etc.) to continue caring for his crops and to prepare the land for harvest time.  In this manner, his production will be healthier and have added value when it comes time to sell the crops at market.  

Edilberto says his age in not an obstacle in his work activity since he loves it.  It is part of his heritage and has become his family's source of income.  In the future he will be able to enjoy a better quality of life with his wife.

loans.use: To buy wholesale farm supplies (pesticides, fungicides, fertilizers, etc.)

loans.name: María Rubiela

texts.es: María, a sus 59 años de edad, es casada y madre de 4 hijos. Durante toda su vida productiva ha trabajado en el campo de la confección, elabora todo tipo de prendas, dependiendo de las solicitudes de sus clientes, trabaja sola todos los días y, de esta manera tiene la oportunidad de apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica de su hogar. Su empuje, dedicación y energía, le han permitido sobrepasar diversos obstáculos que se le han presentado, especialmente aquellos ocasionados por la gran competencia que existe en este campo de acción, sin embargo ha logrado fidelizar su clientela prestando un buen servicio y elaborando productos de excelente calidad. Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar insumos al por mayor (telas, hilos, botones, entre otros), lo que le permitirá ofrecer más variedad de texturas y colores para satisfacer los gustos y requerimientos de su clientela, logrando aumentar las ventas y los ingresos que requiere para aportar con las finanzas del hogar.  Es así como María quiere seguir empleando su tiempo, para fortalecer cada día más su negocio y en un futuro cercano tener la posibilidad de generar oportunidades de empleo a madres cabeza de hogar; así podrá mejorar el bienestar y la calidad de vida tanto de su familia, como la de otras personas que influyan en la labor.
texts.en:
María, 59, is married and has four children.  All her life she has worked as a seamstress making all types of clothing accoridng to customer requests.  She works every day in order to help her husband with the household economy.  Her drive, dedication and energy have allowed her to overcome the obstacles she has met, especially the ones caused by the great amount of competition in the sector.  Nevertheless, she has been able to attract loyal customers through her good service and excellent product quality.

She is now requesting a loan to buy wholesale supplies (fabrics, threads, buttons, etc.) so she can offer more variety of textures and colors to satisfy customer preferences and requirements.  This will increase her sales and the household income.  

María wants to continue working along these lines to improve her family's well being and quality of life, as well as that of the other people who have an influence on her work.

loans.use: To buy wholesale supplies (fabric, threads, buttons, etc.)

loans.name: Vruyr

texts.en:
Vruyr is from a Bagravan village in the Shirak region. He lives with his wife, son and daughter. Vruyr is employed in the government sector; he works as an accountant in the village's self-governing body. His daughter also works in the government sector. Their salaries, however, are not enough to cover the needs of the family. 

Vruyr and his family members are also engaged in breeding cattle and other livestock such as pigs and in cultivating wheat, alfalfa, apples and pears. With the help of his son, Vruyr produces agricultural products for the local market, which is a very important source of the family's income. 

To continue running his agribusiness in a sustainable way, Vruyr needs a loan of $3,000 to purchase some forage supplies for his cattle, to buy fertilizers and to pay for harvesting services. Vruyr and his family rely on the good will of the lenders and will appreciate your support in collecting the needed amount for the loan to sustain their agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase some forage supplies for his cattle, to buy fertilizers and to pay for harvesting services.

loans.name: Diarno

texts.fr: Monsieur DIARNO est un vélo-taxi-man de profession. Il est marié et père de famille. DIARNO habite dans le quartier ou se situe le guichet .Etant à son 1er prêt il sollicite ce dernier pour acheter une moto Djakarta pour en faire du transport. C’est lui qui prend en charges toutes les dépenses quotidiennes et les frais de scolarité de sa famille. Il quitte sa maison à 8h pour n’y revenir que le soir vers les environs de 20h. A l’avenir il souhaite augmenter son parc de moto Djakarta et  améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille/
texts.en: Diarno is a taxi-bike man by trade. He is married and a father, and he lives in the same neighborhood where the branch office lies. He is on his first loan which he wants in order to buy a Djakarta motorbike for transport purposes. It is he who pays for all his family's daily outgoings and schooling costs. He leaves his house at eight in the morning and gets home around eight in the evenings. In the future he would like to expand his fleet of Djakarta motorbikes and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a Djakarta motorbike for transport purposes.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth, a sus 28 años de edad, es madre soltera de un pequeño hijo, al que ha sacado adelante con gran esfuerzo, Durante su vida productiva ha trabajado como vendedora en una tienda de abarrotes, la misma que hoy en día es de su propiedad, pues el antiguo jefe le brindó la oportunidad de comprarla y pasar de ser empleada a propietaria de su unidad productiva. Allí trabaja sola todos los días, logrando generar los ingresos suficientes para solventar las necesidades básicas de su hogar. Su tenacidad, visión, perseverancia y optimismo le han permitido sobrepasar diversos obstáculos que se le presentan, especialmente con la gran cantidad de competidores que existen en el sector; sin embargo, ha sabido manejar la situación y ha aprovechado la ventaja de que el establecimiento ya cuenta con una amplia trayectoria en el mercado. Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar surtido al por mayor (lácteos, galletería, productos de aseo, cervezas, gaseosas, entre otros), así podrá abastecerse lo suficiente para satisfacer la demanda que incrementa en esta temporada de navidad que se aproxima, época en la que sus ventas se incrementan notablemente. Elizabeth, con el sueño de ampliar su negocio,  se visualiza en el momento que el establecimiento esté bien posicionado en el mercado y así poder acreditarlo para que crezca y perdure en el tiempo, mejorando la calidad de vida y ofrecer un mejor bienestar y educación a su hijo.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, 28, is a single mother and she has a little boy who she works hard for.  Throughout her working life she was employed as a salesperson at a grocery store and now she is the owner of that very store.  Her previous boss offered to sell it to her and she accepted the offer.  She works every day and is able to generate enough income to cover basic household needs.  Her drive, vision, perseverence and optimism allow her to overcome the diverse obstacles she meets, especially the many competitors she has in the sector.  But she has known how to manage the situation and has taken advance of the fact that the store is well established in the market.

She is currently requesting a loan to buy wholesale goods (dairy products, baked goods, personal hygiene products, beers, sodas, etc.) so she will have enough supply for the increased demand over the approaching Christmas season, which is when sales increase considerably.  

Elizabeth dreams of expanding her business and seeing it become a well-positioned establishment in the market.  This is so she can invest more money and see it grow and last over time, to improve her son's quality of life and offer him a comfortable lifestyle and a good education.

loans.use: To buy wholesale goods (dairy products, baked goods, personal hygiene products, beers, sodas, etc.)

loans.name: Hortencia

texts.es:
Hortencia tiene 50 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Niepos que pertenece a la Provincia de San Miguel, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Tiene una panadería ubicada en su domicilio donde se dedica a la elaboración de pan, bizcochos, tiene una experiencia de cinco años es muy conocida en la zona.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra de insumos harina, polvo de hornear, azúcar entre otros para incrementar su producción para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Hortencia, 50, lives in the district of Niepos which belongs to the province of San Miguel.  The local people are involved in agriculture, commerce and livestock-farming.  It is two hours from the city of Cajamarca in the northern mountain range of Peru.

She has a bakery set up in her house where she makes bread and cakes.  She has five years' experience and is very well known in the area.

Hortencia is requesting a loan in the amount of 2,000 PEN to buy ingredients such as flour, baking powder and sugar to increase production for her customers and generate more income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy ingredients to make bread: flour, baking powder and sugar.

loans.name: Maria Marleny

texts.es:
María Marleny tiene 41 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos en el Caserío de Chilcal Alto una zona rural del distrito de Oyotun, la población se dedica a la agricultura de algodón y comercio de animales menores, a dos horas con treinta minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

María se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral patos, gallinas, pavos su negocio es engordar los animales y luego ofrecerlos en el mercado de Oyotun, La familia de Anita es unida y se esfuerza, adicionalmente tienen un locutorio donde ofrecen la venta de recargas virtuales a teléfonos móviles, su esposo se dedica a las labores agrícolas en su caserío, cultiva yuca y maíz.

Ella ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de animales y una segunda parte para la compra de saldo de recargas y de esta manera abastecer la demanda de este servicio, generando mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
María Marleny is 41 years old. She lives with her husband and their children in the community of Chilcal Alto, a rural area of the district of Oyotun. The residents work growing cotton and in the small animals trade. It is two hours and thirty minutes from the city of Chiclayo, on the northern coast of Peru.

María works raising and selling poultry such as ducks, chickens and turkeys. Her business is fattening up the animals and later offering them in the market of Oyotun. Anita's family is close and works hard. They also have a call center where they offer virtual refills for cell phone minutes. Her husband does farm work in their community, growing yucca and corn.   

She has asked for a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles to buy balanced feed to fatten up the animals. The second part is to buy cell minutes at a good price and in this way meet the demand of this service, generating more income for the family.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for animals and to buy cell phone minutes at a good price.

loans.name: Sophea

texts.en:
Sophea (in the photo) is a silk weaver who lives on an island in the Mekong River about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has three children, including one son and two daughters. Her husband is a farmer. 

Weaving is a traditional profession for Sophea and for many of the people who live on the island in the Mekong River.

Sophea has requested a Kiva loan several times. She is now applying for another loan in order to buy a calf to raise. She will earn extra income from selling the beef when the calf is fully grown.

loans.use: To buy a calf to raise.

loans.name: Red Rose Group

texts.en:
ASHA was born in 1971 and is single with four children, one of whom is still in school. She has been a food vendor for seven years now. She works from 5 a.m. to 6 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be ASHA's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which she will use to increase her food stock. She dreams of opening a hotel.

Asha will share this loan with her loan group "Red Rose," which has a total of 11 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase her food stock.

loans.name: Elsa Isabel

texts.es:
Elsa Isabel tiene 22 años de edad, vive junto a su hijo en la casa de sus padres en el distrito de Oyotun, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza cremas, cosméticos y perfumes, sus clientes en la mayoría son mujeres, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de productos shampoos, accesorrios para cabello y tintes para ofrecer a sus clientes generando mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Elsa Isabel is 22 years old and lives with her son in her parents' house, in the district of Oyutun, 2 hours from the city of Chiclayo on the north coast of Peru. The people here work in agriculture, livestock and commerce.

Elsa Isabel makes a living selling beauty products such as creams, cosmetics and perfumes. Her customers are mainly women.

She has asked for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles to buy shampoos, hair accessories and hair colours to offer her customers and so generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy hair products.

loans.name: Tatiana Judith

texts.es:
Judith tiene 21 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en el distrito de Buenos Aires, una comunidad que se caracteriza por sus bosques de algarrobo, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Piura, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de cebolla al por mayor en el mercado de su distrito, también tiene un negocio ubicado en su domicilio donde ofrece venta de ropa de damas, caballeros y niños, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de cebolla para distribuirlo por los caseríos aledaños a su comunidad y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Judith is 21 years old. She lives with her husband in the district of  Buenos Aires, a community characterized by its locust forests. Its residents work in agriculture, commerce and in ranching. It is two hours from the city of Piura, on the northern coast of Peru.

She works selling onions wholesale in the market in her district. She also has a business located in her residence where she sells women's, men's and children's clothing. She has asked for a loan of 1 000 nuevos soles to buy onions to distribute in the nearby communities and in this way generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy onions to sell.

loans.name: Mereyra

texts.es:
Mereyra tiene 46 años de edad, vive junto a sus hijas, en el zona rural de Cayaltí, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña, arroz y maíz, comercio de los mismos y agricultura, a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la actividad de crianza y venta de animales menores patos, gallinas, cuyes, en su domicilio, los ofrece en el mercado del distrito, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra alimentos balanceados, para una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Mereyra is 46 years old and lives with her daughters in the rural area of Cayatí, two hours from the city of Chiclayo on the north coast of Peru. The locals make a living from agriculture, growing and selling sugar cane, rice and corn.

Mereyra  makes a living raising and selling small animals such as ducks, chickens and guinea pigs at her home. She sells them at the district market.

She has asked for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles to buy balanced feed so she can have an improved product to offer her customers and so make more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed.

loans.name: Jose Daniel

texts.es:
José Daniel tiene 51 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Lagunas, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña para ofrecerlo a la venta de la empresa Azucarera de la zona, comercio y ganadería, a una hora con cuarenta minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su familia tiene una bodega donde ofrece abarrotes menestras, leche, azúcar, aceite entre otros, José Daniel ofrece servicios de albañilería, es conocido por el servicio que brinda , ha solicitado un préstamo de 600 nuevos soles para invertir en la compra de abarrotes y golosinas para abastecer su negocio y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
José Daniel is 51 years old and lives with his wife and children in the district of Lagunas, one hour and forty minutes away from the city of Chiclayo on the north coast of Peru. The local people make a living growing sugar cane to sell to the local sugar refinery company.

José Daniel and his family have a small shop where they sell vegetable soup, milk, sugar, oil and other items. He also works as a bricklayer and is well-known for the good service he gives.

He has asked for a loan of 600 nuevos soles to buy groceries and sweets so he can stock his shop and so generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy groceries and sweets to stock his business.

loans.name: Good Work Group

texts.en:
Grace is in her early 30s and is single with two children who are still in school. She has been running several businesses for four years now, including selling charcoal, soft drinks and dry food such as sugar, beans, maize flour, baking flour, salt, sweets, etc.  She works from 7 a.m. to 10 p.m. daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be Grace's second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to buy the out-of-stock items for her business. She has successfully paid back her loan successfully. She used the profits to pay her children's school fees, cover household expenses and make some bricks.  She will use this loan to buy dry foods, drinks and charcoal for resale. She dreams of owning a big shop.

Grace will share this loan with her loan group, "GOOD WORK," whose members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy dry foods, drinks and charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Gueybi Alexandra

texts.es:
Gueybi Alexandra tiene 40 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en El Pedregal una zona rural del distrito de Buenos Aires, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica al comercio y cultivo de frutas plátano y mango, venta de chicha de jora una bebida tradicional de la zona norte del Perú, heredada de la las culturas prehispánicas y crianza de animales menores patos y gallinas, es una madre emprendedora que se esfuerza junto a su familia de tener un mejor bienestar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para regar su parcela de plátano y tener una mejor cosecha para ofrecerlo a sus clientes, generando mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Gueybi Alexandra is 40 years old. She lives with her husband in El Pedregal, a rural area of the Buenos Aires district. Its residents work in agriculture, commerce and ranching. It is two hours from the city of Chiclayo, on the northern coast of Peru.

She works growing and selling plantains and mangos and selling chicha de jora, a traditional drink in northern Peru, inherited from the pre-Hispanic cultures. She also raises small animals such as ducks and chickens. She is an enterprising woman who works with her family to have more well being. 

She has asked for a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles to irrigate a field of plantains and have a better harvest to offer her customers, generating more income for her family.

loans.use: to irrigate a field of plantains.

loans.name: Maria Pascuala

texts.es:
Doña María Pascuala tiene 41 años de edad, madre de 6 hijos pero solo 5 dependen de ella quienes ayudan y trabajan en el campo junto a sus padres pero solo uno el cual es menor de todos quien estudia en primaria en la escuela de la comunidad. Ella es ama de casa y agricultora ya que por más de 6 años se ha dedicado a esta actividad en compañía de su esposo quien es agricultor pero fueron sus padres quienes a temprana edad le enseñaron a trabajar la tierra ya que ellos son agricultores por vocación familiar. Sus ingresos económicos dependen del trabajo que diariamente realizan en familia en el campo mediante la atención que dan a sus cultivos de café ya que en la comunidad donde ellos habitan no existe otra fuente de trabajo más que la actividad de campo. Sus cultivos están ubicados a 30 minutos de su casa de habitación al cual en familia se trasladan caminando para poder asistirlos.
Ella ha solicitado a la cooperativa COMIXMUL un financiamiento con el cual comprara insumos agrícolas para su cultivo de café con los cuales busca obtener una mejor cosecha y asegurar el producto al final de plagas y bichos. Los planes a futuro son los de poder cultivar una mejor variedad de café ya que de esta forma ella podrá obtener mejores ingresos con la agricultura y seguir apoyando a sus hijos en sus estudios y demás necesidades que se presenten en un futuro.
texts.en:
María Pascuala is 41 years old and has 6 children. Only 5 of them are dependent on her and they all help out by working in the field along with their parents, apart from the youngest one who goes to the community primary school. María Pascuala is a housewife and farmer and has been doing this work for more than 6 years along with her husband. It was her parents who taught her from a young age to work the land, since they come from a family with a farming tradition. 

The family income depends on the work they do every day as a family in the field, tending their coffee crops, because in the community where they live there is no other option for work apart from farming. The family have a 30 minute walk from their home to where they grow their crops. 

María Pascuala has asked for a loan from the COMIXMUL co-operative which she will use to buy agricultural supplies for the coffee crops, which she hopes will give a better harvest and keep the final crop free of blight and insects.

Her future plans are to grow a better variety of coffee so she can get a better income from her agriculture and continue to support her children in their studies and other needs which may arise in the future.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies to help her coffee crops.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.es:
Marcela tiene 29 años de edad, vive junto a su familia en Contando una zona rural de Pucará, donde su población se dedica al cultivo de frutales y comercio e los mismos y ganadería, es una comunidad que se caracteriza por un clima caluroso, a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a brindar servicios de limpieza y recepción en un reconocido hotel del distrito de Pucará, ha solicitado un préstamo de 800 nuevos soles para invertir en la compra de ropa para niños, damas y caballeros y de esta manera iniciar su negocio propio generando ingresos adicionales para su familia.
texts.en:
Marcela is 29 years old and lives with her family in Contando, a rural area of Pucará, two hours from the city of Jaén in the northern sierra of Peru. The locals make a living growing and selling fruit and from livestock. The area is known for its hot climate.

Marcela works as a cleaner and receptionist in a well-known hotel in the Pucará district. She has asked for a loan of 800 nuevos soles to buy clothing for men, women and children so she can start her own business and generate extra income for her family.

loans.use: to buy clothing for men, women and children.

loans.name: Bega Kwa Bega Group

texts.en:
Islam, who is in his early 20's, is single.  He has been running a barber shop for one year now.  He works from 9:00 a.m. to 8:30 p.m. daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.  

This will be his 4th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loans to buy a new barber machine and salon equipment.  He has paid back all his loans successfully.  He used the profit for household expenses.  He will use this loan to buy salon equipment and to paint the salon so it will attract more customers. He dreams of building his own house.  

Islam will share this loan with his loan group "Bega Kwa Bega" which has ten members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy salon equipment and to paint the salon so it will attract more customers.

loans.name: Mungu Tubariki Group

texts.en:
Sakina, who is in her early 30's, is married with three children, two boys and one girl.  All of them go to school.  She has been a food vendor for three years now.  She works from 9:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.  

This will be Sakina's 12th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to replace the old equipment, increase the food stock and repair the business place by making it strong and painting the outside.  The place now looks attractive and can get more customers.  She is really doing fine.  She is grateful for the loan.  She has paid back all her loans successfully.  She used the profit to pay school fees, buy a plot of land and cover household expenses.  She will use this loan to buy a charcoal stove, chairs, tables and food stock.  She dreams of opening another food stall in a different place.  

Sakina will share this loan with her loan group "Mungu Tubariki" which has a total of seven members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy a charcoal stove, chairs, tables and food stock.

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en: Mwanakombo appreciate her previous Kiva loan that improved her living standards and enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income. She is now requesting a loan of 50,000 KES to purchase more rice, maize flour, wheat flour and cooking oil for her business. She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, maize flour, wheat flour and cooking oil for her business.

loans.name: Marco

texts.es: Marco nació en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco y tiene 41 años de edad, él es casado y tiene cuatro hijos, él vive en la ciudad antes mencionada y donde él desarrolla sus actividades económicas entonces él tiene una pequeña cevicheria.  Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo limón, pescado, sal, maíz, camote y otras cosas más. Agradece a todos los inversionistas por el apoyo brindado y se compromete apagar puntual sus cuotas con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Marco was born in the beautiful city of Cusco. He is 41 years old. He is married and has four children. He lives in the aforementioned city, where he developed his business activities and now has a small ceviche shop. He has already had this business for a number of years, and it is going very well for him, thanks to the effort that he puts into his work. At this time, he needs a loan to buy supplies such as lemon, fish, salt, corn, sweet potatoes, and other items. He is grateful to all the investors for the support offered, and he promises to make his monthly payments punctually and with great responsibility.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as lemons, fish, salt, corn, sweet potatoes, and additional items.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
Maritza vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, la cual se caracteriza por su clima cálido y acogedor. Maritza es una mujer con muchas ganas de salir adelante es por ello que trabaja en su negocio de compra y venta de plátano palillo desde hace 2 años, con lo cual puede tener un ingreso para salir adelante, sobre todo porque es madre de  6 hijos.

Martiza está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar materiales para poder colocar piso en su vivienda ya que actualmente es de tierra, de esta manera podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y luchar para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Tener un salón de belleza y poder darle una profesión a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Maritza lives in the city of Pucallpa, which is characterized by its warm and hospitable climate. Maritza is a woman with a great will to advance. That is why she has worked in her business of buying and selling plantains for two years, from which she can have an income to progress forward, which is especially important because she is the mother of six children.

Maritza is very grateful to the Kiva lenders since thanks to the help that they have offered her, she will be able to buy materials to be able to install a floor in her home, since now it is dirt. In this way she will be able to improve the quality of life of her family and strive to make a reality of her great dream: "to have a beauty salon and to be able to give a career to her children."

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Rita Irene

texts.es:
Rita Irene tiene 66 años de edad, vive junto a su hijo y nuera en el distrito de Cayalti, su población se dedica al cultivo de caña y arroz, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, aves de corral patos y gallinas, también cultiva hortalizas lechuga, repollos, rabanito, cebolla de hoja entre otros, que los ofrece en los mercados de la zona.

Ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 200 nuevos soles para la compra de una mototaxi y de esta manera poder trasladar sus productos a los mercados de la zona y ahorrarse el alquiler de movilidad, generando mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Rita Irene is 66 years old and lives with her son and daughter-in-law in the district of Cayalti, two hours from the city of Chiclayo on the north coast of Peru. The locals make a living from livestock and commerce as well as growing sugar cane and rice.

Rita Irene earns a living raising and selling pigs and poultry such as ducks and chickens. She also grows vegetables such as lettuce, cabbage, radish, onions and other crops, which she sells at the local markets.

She has asked for a loan of 3200 nuevos soles to buy a mototaxi so she can transport her produce to the local markets and save herself transport costs, which will provide more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy a mototaxi for transporting her produce.

loans.name: Nazgul

texts.ru: Назгул 34 года, замужем, несмотря на свой молодой возраст у Назгул и ее супруга есть 5 детей, 4 девочки и 1 мальчик. Супруг частный строитель, работает на заказ. В свободное время помогает Назгул по уходу за хозяйством. Назгул очень трудолюбивая и терпеливая женщина. Не смотря на то, что у нее маленькие дети она умудряется успевать во всем: и детей воспитывать, и накормить и погулять с ними. В целях хорошего будущего для своих детей Назгул занимается животноводством, стартовав 10 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Назгул, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 8 дойных коров. Назгул доит коров сама, молоко сдает реализаторам. Ежемесячный доход составляет 7,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Назгул обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом -на покупку коровы для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Назгул планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en: Nazgul is 34 years old, married, and despite her young age, she and her husband have five children - 4 girls and a boy. Her husband is a builder who works privately on a by-order basis. In his spare time, he helps Nazgul take care of the household and farm. Nazgul is a very hardworking and patient woman. Despite that fact that she has young children, she successfully manages to raise her children, feed them and spend time with them. In order to provide for a good future for her children, Nazgul practices livestock breeding. She started this business 10 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Nazgul's hard work, she currently has 8 milk cows on her farm. Nazgul milks the cows herself and sell the milk for profit. Her monthly income is 7,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Nazgul turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Nazgul plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money for the future education of her children.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Delta Group

texts.en:
Geoffrey, who is in his early 40's, is married with four children who are still in school.  He has been running a butcher shop since 1995.  He works from 6:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Geoffrey's 6th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loans to increase the meat stock and has paid back all his loans successfully.  He used the profit to pay school fees and cover household expenses.  He will use this loan to buy meat and also to start selling fish in his butcher shop.  He dreams of building his house.

Geoffrey will share this loan with his loan group "Delta Group," which has five members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy meat and also to start selling fish in his butcher shop.

loans.name: Monrovia Group

texts.en:
Fatuma, who is in her mid 40's, is a widow with four children who are still in school.  She has been running two types of businesses, food vending and charcoal selling.  She has been in these businesses for ten years now.  She works from 5:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Fatuma's 4th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to buy different types of food and sacks of charcoal.  She also bought bricks for getting ready to start building her house.  She has paid back all her loans successfully.  She used the profit to pay school fees, cover household expenses and buy more bricks.  She will use this loan to buy food stock and sacks of charcoal to use for cooking and selling as well.  She dreams of building her own house.

Fatuma will share this loan with her loan group "Monrovia," which has thirteen members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loans.

loans.use: to buy food stock and sacks of charcoal to use for cooking and selling.

loans.name: Mabomba Mengi Group

texts.en:
Safina, who is in her mid 30's, is single with two children who are still going to school.  She has been running a grocery store business for five years now.  She works from 8:00 a.m. to midnight daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Safina's  6th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to buy drinks, a motorcycle, chairs and tables, and to pay a helper.  She has repaid all her loans successfully.  She used her profit to pay school fees, put electricity in her house and cover household expenses.  She will use this loan to buy different types of drinks to resell and to meet customers' demands.  She dreams of improving her business by putting in better chairs and tables and a good stock of drinks.

Safina will share this loan with her loan group "Mabomba Mengi," which has five members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy different types of drinks to resell and to meet customers' demands.

loans.name: Imee

texts.en: Imee, 30, has been running a hog-fattening business for one year. She also engages in farming as another source of family income. She is requesting additional capital of PHP 25,000 to buy vitamins and feed for her hogs and to purchase fertilizer which will be used in her farming business. In the future, she aspires to save money to expand her businesses and enable her husband not to go to abroad anymore.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and feed for her hogs and to purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: Jyldyz

texts.ru: Жылдыз 34 года, разведена, одна воспитывает 4 сыновей, все дети дошкольного возраста. Жылдыз пришлось пережить развод с супругом. И первое время она была в растерянности и в депрессии, не знала как дальше жить с 4 детьми, как их воспитать одной и обеспечить. И в конце-концов она 5 лет тому назад арендовала небольшое помещение, где на сегодняшний день выпекает хлебо-булочные изделия, используя в качестве стартового капитала сумму в 3,000 сом (KGS). Сумев развить свой бизнес и обретя постоянных клиентов, Жылдыз имеет среднемесячный доход в сумме 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего увеличения и расширения своего бизнеса, Жылдыз обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом -  для покупки двух духовок. Доходы от кредита Жылдыз планирует вложить в увеличение товарооборота и накопить деньги на обучение в университете своих детей.
texts.en: Jyldyz is 34 years old, divorced and is raising four sons who are all toddlers. Jyldyz has gone through a difficult divorce with her husband. At first, she was completely lost and depressed. She did not know how to go on living with four children, how to raise them alone, how to take care of them. Finally, five years ago, she rented a small location where she currently makes baked goods. She did this with start-up capital in the amount of 3,000 som (KGS). Having developed her business and attracted loyal customers, Jyldyz has an average monthly income of 12,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing and expanding her business, Jyldyz turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan to buy two baking ovens. Jyldyz plans to invest the earnings from the loan to increase sales turnover. She also intends to save money for the future college education of her children.

loans.use: to buy two baking ovens.

loans.name: Rekha

texts.en:
Rekha is 37 years old, married and raising one son together with her husband. She and her husband both passed Class IX (Grade 9). Their only son reads in Class VII (Grade 7). Rekha and her husband have a respectful relationship with each other. They live in their own pacca house (concrete-made) in the village Tekatuli, in the district Jalpaiguri.

Rekha's husband, Sujit, is 40 years old. He repairs electrical goods. He has a shop in the locality and has sufficient experience in this field. Rekha is also a very hardworking and purposeful lady, giving financial support to her husband. She has been engaged in a milk supply business for the last few years. 

Rekha applied for a loan from Kiva’s partner Belghoria Janakalyan Samity (BJS) to purchase a cow with the aim of further developing her business. There is a high demand for milk in the locality, so she hopes to earn enough money from her business to enable her to give good financial support to her family and a good future to her son. Her full thanks go to BJS and Kiva for the loan.

loans.use: To purchase a cow for expanding her milk supply business.

loans.name: Meeriban

texts.ru: Мээрибан 47 лет, разведена, одна воспитывает двух сыновей. Супруг Мээрибан не принимает никакого участия в воспитании. Не поддерживает материально, в связи с этим Мээрибан  сама обеспечивает и воспитывает своих детей.  У Мээрибан - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Мээрибан занимается животноводством, стартовав 7 лет назад, с покупки скота на 18,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Мээрибан, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 5 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 7,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Мээрибан обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом -на покупку коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Мээрибан планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en: Meeriban is 47 years old, divorced, and is raising two sons by herself. Meeriban's husband does not take part in their upbringing at all. Not being supported financially, Meeriban takes care of and raises her children on her own. Meeriban has a secondary education. As the main source of income for her family, Meeriban practices livestock breeding. She started this business 7 years ago, with an initial purchase of cattle in the amount of 18,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Meeriban's hard work, she currently 2 milk cows and 5 sheep on her farm. Her monthly income is 7,000 som (KGS). For the purpose of further developing her business, Meeriban turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum and Partners." She is requesting a loan to buy cows to increase the size of her herd. Meeriban plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock. She also intends to save money for the future education of her children.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Diap

texts.fr: Monsieur DIAP est un transporteur de profession, il est marié et père de 6 enfants. Agé de 31ans il a une expérience de plus de 5ans dans son activité. Il sollicite ce montant pour réfectionner son véhicule qui est en panne et ensuite faire la tôlerie et la peinture. Il commence sa journée à 6h du matin pour la terminer à 20h.DIAP  gère les charges quotidiennes de sa famille et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants.  A l’avenir il veut développer son parc de taxi urbain afin de pouvoir augmenter ses revenus et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Diap is a taxi driver.  He is married, and father to six children.  He is 31 years old, and has more than five years' experience in his business.

Diap will use his loan to repair his vehicle which has broken down.  He will also overhaul the bodywork and the paintwork.  

Diap starts his working day at 6am and finishes at 8pm.  He is responsible for the day-to-day expenses of his family, and the school charges of his children.  

In the future he would like to extend his business to a fleet of taxis, in order to increase his income and improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to overhaul his taxi.

loans.name: Bara

texts.fr: Monsieur BARA est un tailleur de profession, qui est marié et père de famille. Il habite  à quelques kilomètres du Guichet et est à son 2ème prêt.  Il demande ce crédit d’un montant 150.000F pour acheter une machine à coudre marque Cornière pour mieux satisfaire sa clientèle. Il prend en charges les dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille et frais de scolarité de ses enfants. Il commence sa journée à 9h pour la terminer à 20h. BARA souhaite augmenter la taille de son atelier pour mieux gérer  la situation familiale.
texts.en:
Bara is a professional tailor who is married, with children.  He lives several kilometres away from the field partner, and this will be his second loan.  He has requested 150,000 francs CFA in order to buy a Cornière brand, sewing machine.  This will help him satisfy the needs of his customers.

Bara is responsible for the daily expenses of his family, and the school charges for his children.  He starts his working day at 9am and finishes at 8pm.

In the future, Bara would like to increase the size of his workshop in order to better provide for his family.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine to add to his other machines.

loans.name: Sophal

texts.en:
Sophal (in the photo), age 48, lives in a village about 25 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has two sons and one daughter. Two of her children are married and another one is a garment worker.     
Sophal and her husband are farmers. They grow rice on their farmland plot in the village where they live. 
Sophal is applying for a loan to purchase a motorbike for her son who is a garment worker and needs to drive to work. He does not have his own transportation to get work; he needs to take a motorbike often to succeed.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for her son to drive to work.

loans.name: Manyanya Group

texts.en:
Aisha was born in 1969, is married, and has two children who are still at school.  She has a clothing shop and a catering business as well.  She has  been in her business since 1987.  She works from 7:00 am to midnight daily and is able to make a very good monthly profit.

This will be Aisha's 2nd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to buy clothes and bought food for her catering business including rice, cooking oil, chicken and meat.  She has paid back her loan successfully.  She used the profit to pay school fees and cover household expenses. She will use this loan to buy better catering equipment like serving dishes, plates, spoons etc.  She dreams of having a very big catering business.

Aisha will share this loan with her loan group "Manyanya Group" which consists of three members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy better catering equipment like serving dishes, plates, spoons etc.

loans.name: Adama

texts.fr: ADAMA  est commerçante de profession qui  évolue dans la vente de Bazin ; Thioup et d’autres tissus très demandés dans sa localité. Elle est marié et père de 05 enfants, Elle est à son 2ème prêt et sollicite ce dernier pour acheter des tissus afin de les vendre à ses clients. Elle gère les charges quotidiennes de sa famille. Elle commence sa journée à 9h pour la terminer à 20h. Elle voudrait à l’avenir disposer d’une place au marché pour mieux récupérer plus de clientèle afin de pouvoir augmenter ses revenus et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Adama works in commerce and sells damask fabric and Thioup (dyed cotton cloth), both of which are in high demand in her area.  She is married and mother to five children.  This will be her second loan with the field partner, and it will be used to buy fabric for resale to her customers.

Adama is responsible for the daily expenses of her family.  She starts her working day at 9am and finishes at 8pm.

In the future, she would like to have a regular place at the market in order to attract more customers, increase her earnings and, therefore, improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy damask fabric and Thioup (dyed cotton cloth) for resale.

loans.name: Urafiki Group

texts.en:
Ghati, who is in her early 30s, is single with two daughters who are in school. For a period of 13 years now, Ghati has been engaged with two different businesses. She sells charcoal and she is also a tailor. She does her business from 7:30 am to 6:00 pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit. 

This is Ghati's third loan request from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used her previous loans to increase her stock of charcoal so as to meet her client demand. She has paid back all of her previous loans successfully. She used her profit to pay for school fees and household expenses.  She will use this loan to buy sacks of charcoal and tailoring materials for her business. She dreams of expanding her business.

Ghati will share this loan with her loan group  "Urafiki" which consists of four members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal and tailoring materials for her business.

loans.name: Fridah

texts.en:
Fridah is single and she rents a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

She operates a rabbit-selling business, selling at the market to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of disease outbreak in her business. 

With the 50,000 Kenyan shillings, she wants to purchase a new species of rabbit as well as drugs for her rabbits. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase a new species of rabbit and drugs for her rabbits.

loans.name: Mesalim

texts.en:
Mesalim is asking for a loan because she believes that through it, she will improve her business.  The previous loan enabled her to save money in her cloth-selling business. She is requesting for a loan of 40,000 Kenyan shillings to purchase more bales of cloths for her business.

She feels that she was able to make a good investment with her previous loan, which to date has allowed her to maintain her level of profits and help her family cover their personal expenses

loans.use: to purchase more bales of cloths for her business.

loans.name: Sandhya

texts.en:
Sandhya is a married woman. She is only 18 years old. She received education up to Class VIII (Grade 8). She lives with her husband Sona and two sons in their own kachha house (mud and straw-made) in the small village of Domohoni in Maynaguri in the district Jalpaiguri. Her husband is 28 years old and received education up to VI (Grade 6). He is engaged in farming. 

Sandhya's husband is a hard worker and a very enterprising man. He works in their small piece of land from dawn to dusk to grow vegetables, which he sells in the local market and earns money for their livelihood. But his income is too low to bear all the expenses for their family. 

Sandhya wants to extend the business of her husband, so she requested a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase good quality potato seeds, fertilizers, manure etc., so that her husband can grow good quality potatoes in their land. He will give his full effort to the cultivation of potatoes so the crops are easily sold in the market. There is a good demand for potatoes in the local market and they hope that their produce will be sold at a high price.

Sandhya's hopes and dreams are to be able to expand their business to give good financial support to her family, give a better life to their sons and purchase a piece of land from the profit generated from the business.

She is thankful to BJS and Kiva for giving her the loan.

loans.use: To purchase potato seeds and fertilizers for growing potatoes.

loans.name: Rinku

texts.en:
Rinku is a married woman of 26 years. She has a small family which consists of her husband, and their only son. Rinku read up to Class IX (Grade 9). Her husband Kamal is 30 years old. He received education up to X standard (Grade 10). Their only son is below the school-going age. They live in the small village of Bagnan in Maynaguri in the district Jalpaiguri in their own kachha house (mud, straw and bamboo-made).

Rinku’s husband has a milk supply business, selling milk door-to-door in the locality. 

Rinku is a young lady, with many dreams and is eager to overcome the problems and get ahead in life alongside her family members. She decided to start cultivating tea plants in their own plot of land, so she applied for a loan from Kiva’s partner, BJS to purchase tea saplings and fertilizers for cultivation of tea. Selling tea leaves is a profitable business and has a good demand in their locality and in the present market, so she hopes to earn a good profit from her business.

She hopes to upgrade their financial conditions and give better education and a better future to her son with the profit which she generates from the business.

She is thankful to BJS and Kiva for the loan.

loans.use: To purchase tea-saplings and fertilizers for cultivating tea plants

loans.name: Rinku

texts.en:
Rinku is a 24-year-old woman.  She is married and a housewife.  She attended secondary school until IX standard (Grade 9). She is a mother of one son, who is a small child and below the school-going age. Her husband Probhas is 30 years old and is a carpenter by trade. They live in the small village of Madhy Khagrabari in the district Jalpaiguri, in their own pacca house (concrete-made) .

The earnings from Rinku's husband's business do not provide sustenance to the family. It is impossible for him to meet all the needs of the family,  as the prices of essential goods are going up. Rinku wants to help her husband. She learned that BJS (Kiva’s partner) gives loans to rural women to start new businesses, so she applied for a loan to purchase firewood. She is a very energetic and optimistic woman. She has chosen this business as she can get enough supply of wood in their village. Moreover there is a less risk in this business.

Rinku hopes to earn a great profit from this business as firewood is used as fuel in rural areas and she can get a good price in her locality. She also hopes that the living standard of her family will definitely be improved and it will add value to her business and the future education of her son.

loans.use: To purchase firewood for selling in her locality.

loans.name: Runa

texts.en:
Runa is a 27-year-old rural woman from a small village Tekatuli, in Maynaguri in the district Jalpaiguri. She is married to Gobindo and blessed with one son and one daughter. Runa and her husband both received education up to Xth standard (Grade 10).  Their son goes to school and reads in class IV (Grade 4).  Their daughter is a small child and is below the school-going age. They live in their own pacca house (concrete-made).

Runa's husband who is 36 years old, is a farmer by trade. The main source of income for the family is his agricultural activities. Runa is also very hard-working and enthusiastic. Besides managing all the household work, she helps her husband in his agricultural activities. They manage their financial needs with great difficulty. 

Runa plans to sell milk and dairy products in the locality and earn more money for her family.  She learned about BJS, (Kiva’s partner) and has taken a loan to purchase a cow to start a business of selling milk and dairy products (butter, curd, and paneer--homemade cheese) in the local market. This business will be profitable for them because in that area there is a great demand for milk and dairy products.

In the future she dreams of making her family financially strong, giving good education to her children, and expanding her business with the profit, which will be generated from this business.

She is grateful to BJS and Kiva for funding her loan.

loans.use: To purchase a cow to start a business selling milk.

loans.name: Niyozali

texts.ru: Ниёзали начинающий бизнесмен, проживает в районе Рудаки. Он женат, отец шестерых детей. У него четверо сыновей в возрасте от 10 до 21 года и двое дочерей в возрасте от 8 до 16 лет. Двое его старших сыновей в России, один работает, второй собирается учиться. А остальные дети еще школьники. Жена Ниёзали домохозяйка, сам он до сегодняшнего дня работал таксистом. Чтобы улучшить финансовое благополучие семьи, Ниёзали решил начать торговый бизнес. Он считает прибыльным торговлю продуктов питания и поэтому открывает бизнес в этой сфере. Ниёзали уже приобрел магазин. Ему остается только закупить продукты питания. С этой целью он просит кредит. Жена и дети будут помогать Ниёзали в новом бизнесе. Они очень надеятся на поддержку.
texts.en: Niyozali lives in the Rudaki district and is just getting started as a businessman. He is married and has six children. His four sons are between the ages of 10 and 21, and his two daughters are 8 and 16. His two eldest sons are in Russia: one is working and the other is getting ready to go to university. The rest of the children are still in school. His wife is a homemaker, and he himself worked as a taxi driver up until now. To improve his family's finances, Niyozali decided to start a retail business. He thinks selling grocery products will be profitable and therefore plans to open a shop. Niyozali already has a location for the store and just needs to buy food products. He has asked for a loan to help him do this. His wife and children will help Niyozali with the new business and hope very much for support.

loans.use: to buy food products and open a grocery store.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Les membres du groupe  Benkadi  sont essentiellement des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 33 ans, et ont en moyenne 4 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des  familles monogamiques au quartier NOUMOUSSO un des quartiers périphérique  de la ville de KADIOLO. 
Elles sont à leur cinquième prêt avec l’institution de micro finance Soro Yiriwaso, dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle.
Mme  MAMOU  fait la vente du beurre de karité dans ce groupe de femmes. Elle est la 1 ère personne assise  de la  droite vers la gauche sur la photo.
Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt  500 kg de noix de karité qu'elle va transformer en beurre. Elle vend ses produits au marché et à la maison au comptant à une clientèle constituée de femmes et d’hommes. 
Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 40 000 francs CFA dont une partie est  utilisée  pour payer le prêt et son interêt et l’autre pour son épargne.
texts.en:
The members of the group Benkadi are mainly married women who are on average 33 years old, and have on average 4 children. Most of them live in monogamous families in the neighborhood Noumousso, one of the outlying neighborhoods of the town of Kadiolo.

They are on their fifth loan with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso, out of concern to satisfy the needs of their clientele.

Madam Mamou sells shea butter as part of this group of women. She is the first person sitting from right to left in the photo. With her loan she plans to buy 500 kg of shea nuts which she will transform into butter. She sells her products at the market and from home for cash to a clientele consisting of women and men.

She envisions making an average monthly profit of 40,000 FCFA of which part is used to repay the loan and the other part is saved.

loans.use: to buy shea nuts.

loans.name: Marta Lidia

texts.es:
Marta Lidia con 34 años de edad es ama de casa y agricultora, madre de 5 hijos 3 de ellos estudian en diferentes grados de educación en la escuela de la comunidad y los dos mayores trabajan junto a ella y su padre en el campo en las diferentes actividades que diariamente se realizan como la aplicación de abono, limpieza, poda entre otras. Tiene 3 años de educación que gracias a sus padres pudo cursar pero por la falta de apoyo económico no pudieron seguirle apoyando para que ella terminara sus estudios primarios. Desde hace 8 años en compañía de su esposo trabaja la tierra especialmente en el cultivo de café pero fue a temprana edad  que ella aprendió gracias a sus padres quienes son agricultores por muchas generaciones. Ella también maneja un pequeño negocio de pulperia ubicado en su casa de habitación siendo sus clientes sus amigos, familiares y amigos que viven en la zona y otras personas que llegan de las zonas aledañas. La tierra que trabajan en familia es propia y está ubicada muy cerca de su casa de habitación por lo que les permite el fácil acceso y mantenimiento del mismo. 
Sus planes y metas para el futuro ampliar sus cultivos de café mediante la compra de más tierra y cultivar una mayor y una mejor variedad de producto que pueda ser más atractivo para sus clientes y demás. Para con sus hijos dar la oportunidad a cada uno de ellos que puedan convertirse en profesionales a nivel universitario adquiriendo los conocimientos necesarios para el día de mañana que ellos como padres falten tengan una tierra donde trabajar, formar sus empresas, sus hogares y generen empleo y no sean empleados. Por lo que hoy en día ella solicita un financiamiento con el cual comprara insumos como abono, foliares, fertilizantes entre otros para fortalecer y proteger sus cultivos de café.
texts.en:
Marta Lidia, 34, works as a housewife and in agriculture. She has five children: three of them are still studying and two are adults and work together with her and their father in agriculture. Every day, they perform different activities, such as spreading fertilizers and cleaning and weeding the fields. 

She studied three years of primary school thanks to her parents, but could not continue due to the lack of economic support. Eight years ago, she started to grow coffee together with her husband, but she learned to do it when she was very young, thanks to her parents who have been working with this for many years. She also has a small grocery store at home and her customers are friends, relatives, neighbors and people from the surroundings. They work their own land, located close to where they live, so they have easy access to it and can easily give it maintenance.

Her plans and goals for the future are to enlarge her coffee plantations and buy more land. She will plant more and better types of coffee in order to make her product more attractive to her customers. She wants to give her children the opportunity to study at the university and become professionals so that in the future, when she and her husband are gone, they can continue to work their land, start their own businesses, create jobs and be independent entrepreneurs.

This is why she is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies, such as compost, leaf fertilizers and other types of fertilizers needed to strengthen and protect her coffee plantations.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee plantations.

loans.name: Tinku

texts.en:
Tinku, a 37-year-old woman, is a rural resident of Haspatal Para in Maynaguri in the district Jalpaiguri. She is married.  She lives with her husband Porimol, 52 years old, and their only son in their own pacca house (concrete-made). Both Tinku and her husband studied up to class XI (Grade 11). Their only son goes to school and reads in class XI (Grade 11).

Tinku and her husband are engaged in the clothing business. Tinku as well as her husband have been interested in the field of retail business of clothing for a long time, specially buying and selling of sarees (clothing for Indian women) and consider it a profitable business. Tinku is a strong-minded and driven person.  If she sets a goal, she gives her full effort to achieving it.  But due to increase in the prices of clothing, they cannot afford much money to maintain their garment stock. So, the earnings from their business are not sufficient to overcome their financial hurdles.

Tinku applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to expand their business by purchasing more clothing stock for her business. She hopes it will help her to earn more profit, as it is a lucrative business, because this type of clothing has great demand in the local market.

Tinku will meet the educational expenses of her son and improve their poor financial conditions with the profit she earns from the business. Tinku dreams  of giving her son a good future with a good education.

She is grateful to BJS and Kiva for giving her the loan.

loans.use: To purchase women's clothing for expansion of her existing retail business.

loans.name: Anar

texts.ru: Анар 44 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. Двое старших детей- Адилет и Айнура - студенты,  остальные двое учатся в школе. Супруг помогает по хозяйству. Живут одной большой дружной семьей. Каждый член семьи пытается внести свой вклад в развитие благоустройства своей семьи. Сама Анар по характеру очень трудолюбивая, целеустремленная и просто заботливая мать. У Анар - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Анар занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 17 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Анар, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 2 теленка и овцы, а также в активах имеет 2,80 ГА земельной доли, на которой выращиваеткартофель, сеют зерновые культуры и экспарцет для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. У Анар и ее семьи очень большой опыт в животноводстве и полеводстве. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Анар обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коров ддля увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Анар планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, а также полученный доход поможет улучшить жилищные условия семьи.
texts.en:
Anar is 44 years old, married, and together with her husband is raising four children. The two older children - Adilet and Ainura - are high school students, and the remaining two are schoolchildren. Her husband helps around the farm. They live as one big happy family. Every member of the family tries to contribute her part to develop the well-being of the family.

Anar herself by character is very hardworking, determined and simply a loving mother. Anar has a high school education. As a main source of income for her family, Anar is engaged in raising livestock and growing crops, having started 17 years ago with the purchase of livestock for 5,000 som KGS. Thanks to her hard work, Anar currently has on her farm: one dairy cow, two calves and sheep, and also in assets has a 2.80-hectare plot of land, on which she grows potatoes, sows cereals and sainfoin for consumption and sale.
